title: DataInsightsAppConfig
description: No configuration needed to instantiate the Data Insights Pipeline. The logic is handled in the backend.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable Backfill for the configured dates

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date from which to start the backfill

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Date for which the backfill will end

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events processed at a time (Default 100).

recreateDataAssetsIndex.title: Recreate DataInsights DataAssets Index
recreateDataAssetsIndex.description: Recreates the DataAssets index on DataInsights. Useful if you changed a Custom Property Type and are facing errors. Bear in mind that recreating the index will delete your DataAssets and a backfill will be needed.
